name: "Glop" GoadWare Game Jam #6
description:
This game was made for the GoedWare Game Jam of 2022 with the theme Absorption. 

My game is a slime creature that gets lost in the forest and you have to help him get out by running through different obstacles.

Use the WASD keys to move around and the Q or Shift key to split your mass. Use the R key to restart from your last checkpoint.
